title: very quiet 1bed/1bath/ 1 car parking condo near financial district
posting_body: Super quiet one bedroom/one bath Luxury apartment in the esteemed Parc Telegraph building.
It is in the heart of North Waterfront next to the base of Telegraph Hill with beautiful trees and flowers with two water fountains.
Walk, run or bike along the Embarcadero or opt for a ride on the historic streetcar line to Fisherman's Wharf, Pier 39 or the Financial District.
Many trendy shops, restaurants, and cafes, with other major tourist attractions are along the way.
A beautiful, flat, sun filled neighborhood close to everything making this the perfect location for young professionals who desires an easy city life with or without cars!
This particular unit is upgraded with wall mirrors which opens up the space and invites in the natural light.
It is super quiet , has partial bay view with cool breeze directly from the bay.
The diagonal view into the beautifully landscaped courtyard makes both rooms away from street noises generated by cars, and morning garbage trucks – sleeping in, no problem!
The unit features large double windows with window screens in both living and bedrooms.
The living room has a large entertainment center which can also be used for lounging or reading.
The bedroom has carpet floor and fits a king-sized bed with underbed storage and still has room left over to use as study or as a sitting area by the window.
It also has a walk-in closet.
The bathroom has vanity lighting, solid storage and a shower/tub combination.
The kitchen is equipped with a full-sized dishwasher and other modern kitchen appliances with plenty of counter space, storage and cabinets.

The Parc Telegraph building is professionally managed and is a full amenity building with 24hr security/ doorman, enormous professional sized fitness center, Jacuzzi, sauna, a private green courtyard with water fountains and event rooms.
Unit Details:
•	Wall mirrors in living room
•	Huge entertainment center
•	Window coverings and screens
•	Kitchen with lots of counter space and good layout
•	Dishwasher
•	Electric oven and range
•	Refrigerator
•	microwave
•	In-sink disposal
•	Wood flooring in the living space
•	Wall-to-wall carpeting in the bedroom
•	Walk-in closet
Location of the building:  at Lombard and Montgomery
•	At the base of Telegraph hill near Embarcadero, Pier 27 cruise terminal,  bay club, Levi Plaza, Peaceful and quiet with natural beauty.
•	Close to shops and restaurants on The Embarcadero and in North Beach
•	Close to Downtown and the Financial District
•	Short Walking distance to Bay street shopping such as Trader Joe’s and Safeway and to the Ferry Building farmer’s market
Public Transportation: Muni bus line, F Streetcar line at the corner.
Bart (subway ) is a few blocks away
Building amenities:
•	24hr security/ doorman with package pickup
•	Conference room /Library
•	professional sized fitness center, Jacuzzi, sauna
•	External storage is available for residence to lease (depends on availability)
•	Two separate laundry facilities with ample high-end machines
On-site free for use to residents
•	beautifully landscaped Courtyard / water fountains
Other notes:
•	secured garage Parking for 1 car is included
•	No pets
•	Non smoking
•	Owner pays for HOA, Water and garbage
•	Tenant pays for PGE and internet
•	Application fee $40
